attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you fed up of political correctness? Why should we fund a country of religious fanatics who are so at odds with our beliefs and culture? Do you or a family member need NHS treatment? Has it been delayed due to a lack of funding?
Surely, your taxes should be spent here, not in a country bent on punishing teachers who name a bear muhammed?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
